ygData.subject: Re: Antiqued Silver Band [*Spoiler*]
ygData.msgSnippet: You got 1 plat for the dervish ring?  Wow!  I usually only get around 1 gold... Valacian - 18th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony ... From:	Erdrick, TheRegulators
ygData.messageBody:
You got 1 plat for the dervish ring? Wow! I usually only get around 1 gold...

Valacian - 18th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Erdrick, TheRegulators [SMTP:pornstarpat@...]
Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 12:14 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Antiqued Silver Band [*Spoiler*]

From: "Erdrick, TheRegulators" <pornstarpat@...>

Anyone have any more detailed info on this ring? The only info I
managed to get was this, off of EQ'lizer:

"These magical rings can be foud off the second Shadowknight in
Befallen. They grant +2 armor class."

I was just curious if there's anything else special about it, aside
from the increase in AC -- an NPC offered to buy it for 4platinum, I
believe, as opposed to the 1platinum offered for a Cutthroat Dervish
Ring.

Thanks in advance, for any help.

Erdrick, The Regulators
www.theregulators.org
(Rallos Zek)
